author: Press Association
title: Bomb disposal team called after Tory candidate receives suspicious package
text:
A Conservative candidate in the General Election said he received a suspicious parcel at his constituency office on Thursday, leading to bomb disposal specialists being called in.
Sir Jeremy Quin, an ex-defence minister and Conservative candidate for the Horsham constituency, received the package at his Sussex office.
Bomb disposal experts were called in to investigate after a decision by Sussex Police.
The force said the presence at the office was stood down by around 9pm on Thursday after the package was confirmed to be safe, although the force is investigating whether an offence has been committed.
Bomb disposal experts outside the office of Jeremy Quin, an ex-defence minister and Conservative candidate for the Horsham constituency, after receiving a suspicious parcel at his Sussex office (Aoife Glover/PA) In a statement, the force said: “After an assessment it has been confirmed that the package was safe and there was no risk to the public.
“Officers are reviewing whether there has been an offence committed in the sending of the package and this investigation is ongoing.”
Tory candidate Sir Jeremy said: “After the receipt of a suspicious parcel at my Horsham office earlier today the police decided that the incident should be escalated and specialists were called in.
“It is still under investigation but there is no cause for alarm and the incident is being thoroughly and professionally addressed.
“It’s a huge privilege to engage in public service but sadly in the world in which we live incidents of this nature always have to be taken seriously.
“I am very grateful to the emergency services for their prompt actions and continuing work to ensure public safety.”

author: Flavio Latif
title: Torcedor do Nacional imita macaco em direção à torcida do São Paulo
text:
Esporte Torcedor do Nacional imita macaco em direção à torcida do São Paulo Do UOL, em São Paulo (SP) 15/08/2024 18h27
Torcedor do Nacional imita macaco em direção à torcida do São Paulo no estádio Gran Parque Central Imagem: Silas Lambert/Reprodução Um torcedor do Nacional fez atos racistas em direção à torcida do São Paulo , nesta quinta-feira (15), antes da bola rolar para o jogo entre as equipes, válido pela ida das oitavas de final da Copa Libertadores , no estádio Gran Parque Central.
O que aconteceu O torcedor que estava no setor dos camarotes do estádio fez gestos imitando um macaco, e foi fotografado por um jornalista. O registro é do repórter Silas Lambert.
Este é o terceiro caso de racismo da semana em jogos válidos pela Copa Libertadores. Torcedores do San Lorenzo fizeram gestos racistas direcionados à torcida do Atlético-MG em jogo disputado na Argentina na terça-feira (13).
Juca Kfouri
Nacional x São Paulo: o jogo mais pesado da noite
Josias de Souza
Lula não consegue dizer que Maduro é ditador
Cris Guterres
E se a maternidade fosse uma prova olímpica
PVC
São Paulo e o truque do barulho de torcida em hotel
E na última quarta-feira (14), um torcedor do Botafogo também viralizou nas redes sociais após ser flagrado imitando um macaco em direção à torcida do Palmeiras. Após ser reconhecido, ele foi banido pelo clube.
Classificação e jogos Libertadores Comunicar erro Veja também Deixe seu comentário Só para assinantes

author: @nmas
title: Meta Eliminará a Verificadores de Información de Instagram, Facebook y Threads
text:
Meta Eliminará a Verificadores de Información de Instagram, Facebook y Threads
Mark Zuckerberg anunció que Meta eliminará a los verificadores de información de Instagram, Facebook y Threads. El empresario alegó que la medida impulsará la libertad de expresión en sus plataformas
COMPARTE:
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
